title: Backdoor Super YI/TRYND/ Maybe Aatrox.
body:
OK this might seem easy because it is.
For this mode, you can go Yi or Trynd. It will probs work with aatrox but i havent tried.
For this u need to have the runes like this +53AD at level 18. (it works better than half amount of flat AD)
Prefer to be jungle as it is what i do.
Make sure to have an activated{{item:2139}} . why? it deals 25TD to turrets on basic attacks no cooldown.
If better smite a krug before hands to have an even better TD burst on the turret.
For YI
Once you have these items and at least level 16, You can ult and activate {{item:3142}} , charge up to a tower and hit it.
Make sure these are your items:{{item:3046}} {{item:3931}} {{item:1304}} {{item:3142}} {{item:1053}} OR{{item:3072}}  and {{item:1038}}  Or {{item:3031}} . At least 310 AD is required. 
For Trynd: Have these items and at least 280AD 2.1 Atk speed.
{{item:3931}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3031}} {{item:1304}} and {{item:1053}}  or better{{item:3072}} ..

replies.body: Good luck getting past early game with those runes. You will be demolished in the jungle or in lane.
no mate, it op....... i do get past early games, in lane, i play passively. My AD scaleing is higher than others so i win.
Or instead get the Red pot and just go and stomp the enemy team.
